project-basis: I used meteor.js to make the mobile application views, and standard JavaScript to make the appropriate API calls.
project-challenges: PayPal blocks you if you test too much, too close together.
project-future-plans: Posting on GitHub for others to use.
project-purpose: Automatically track who asked for what to be purchased, and when the items are purchased and the prices entered, the money is automatically withdrawn from the requestor's PayPal account.
project-inspiration: Friends hate going shopping for groceries, and hate hunting each other down to get paid back.
project-subtitle: A platform to collaboratively build shopping lists and divide the cost amongst the participants.
